Subject:Re: Truth - please stop these types of comminications
Message 3540 of 4024
I know those rub you the wrong way and how hard it is just to get one to them, but I sent it through Alan so hoped that would be ok. Mind letting
Max have it? It’s stupid, cheap, but maybe funny. And it lets him know I still think about him no matter what.
That is one of the things parents who are targeted to be erased are advised to do. Like my volunteer stuff and attendance at everything he does. At
some point he will look back and know that the man who he is named after, loved him unconditionally.
He might even realize that if everyone got to just kick people out of their family when they were unhappy with them, there would not be any families
at all.
